x_qune_da_error_code.remediation: Troubleshooting steps should be followed in the order given below: 1. For SNMP Devices: 1.1. Ensure that SNMP is enabled on the Device. 1.2. Configure ACL on SNMP Device to allow connections from IP Addresses of all the configured ServiceNow MID Server Hosts. 1.3. Work with the ServiceNow Team to validate the Device Credentials are stored in ServiceNow. 1.4. Work with the Network Team to update Network Firewall rules / policies to allow SNMP traffic between the MID Server and the Device. 2. For other Devices: 2.1. Enable the Device to accept connections on the port being probed by the Shazzam Port Probe. 2.2. Work with the Network Team to update Network Firewall rules / policies to allow WMI / SSH traffic between the MID Server and the Device. 2.3. Device has non-standard port configurations. It is not being detected by the out-of-the-box ServiceNow Shazzam Probe. Work with the ServiceNow Team to configure a custom Port Probe with the applicable IP Services, if Device is in scope for Discovery.
x_qune_da_error_code.root_cause: Device is not accepting connections on the port being probed by the Shazzam Port Probe.
